entities.name: autumn
entities.description: The season of the year that arrives suddenly that year.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A parent who is pushing a trolley with owls and has a daughter named Lily.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: The redheaded girl who wants to go to Hogwarts now.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: One of Harry's sons who is arguing with his brother James.

entities.name: james
entities.description: Harry's son who does not want to be in Slytherin house.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: One of Harry's children who is telling James to give it a rest.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts that James does not want to be in.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story who is a parent and has children going to Hogwarts.

entities.name: platform nine and ten
entities.description: A barrier between two platforms at the train station where the family is heading.

entities.name: owls
entities.description: The owls that are being carried in cages on top of the trolleys by Harry and his wife.

relationships.description: Harry is a parent to Lily, as he tells her it won't be long before she goes to Hogwarts.
Albus and James are brothers who are arguing about which house they will be in at Hogwarts.
Harry's son James does not want to be in Slytherin house, as he tells his father.
James and Ginny are siblings who are present at the train station with their parents.
The family, including Harry, is heading towards platform nine and ten at the train station.
Harry is carrying owls in cages on top of trolleys as he heads to the train station with his family.
